original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 326.75/85 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 326.75/85 to the US dollar on Wednesday, from 326.90/327.00 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.40/55 percent from 13.45/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 13.70/85 percent from 13.75/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 13.60/75 percent from 13.75/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.05/15 percent from 14.05/10 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.05/15 percent, from 14.05/10 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.05/30 percent, from 14.05/20 percent. (Colombo/Dec20/2023)
